text_block_list.text: First of all— naturally, I have great faith in their strength, their brilliance. There is no doubt in my mind that they are indispensable if we are to shine brilliantly as the Northern Lights.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
However… Mr. C.B… Katsuragi Ace. 
To me, you two are—
HAAAAAAAAA-!!!
text_block_list.name: Rudolf & C.B.

text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff…——— ha, haha-…!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …gh—!

text_block_list.name: Rudolf & C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Haa, ha, haa—…!! 
Hah, haa… phew…—!!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right, my bad! We said we'd just do a light run. 
Heh… it ended up getting pretty fun.
Gh… No. Getting a feel for your strength in full drive was good windfall.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: (So this is Mr. C.B…! The one they call "The Triple Crown Umamusume who defies common sense,"…!)
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: In the lead is Katsuragi Ace! Katsuragi Ace is still holding on! From the outside is Symboli Rudolf, but Katsuragi Ace keeps her lead!!
text_block_list.name: Commentary
Commentary
text_block_list.text: AND SHE CROSSES THE FINISH LINE!! First place is Katsuragi Ace! It's Katsuragi Ace! In this "Japan Cup," at the top of the world! Katsuragi Ace reigns supreme!
LET'S GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Katsuragi Ace lets out her victory scream! Not only has she taken down last year's Triple Crown winner, Mr. C.B.—
text_block_list.name: Commentary

text_block_list.text: —she's also become the first Umamusume to defeat this year's undefeated Triple Crown Umamusume, the absolute "Emperor", Symboli Rudolf!
text_block_list.name: Commentary

text_block_list.text: Hah… hah… — hah… gh…!!
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: (Katsuragi… Ace… tch— Katsuragi Ace…—!!)
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: … Yes, that's right. Katsuragi Ace. Mr. C.B…
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: You two, and you two alone… to me, you are—
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I won't let them get ahead of me, no matter what it may cost… They're rivals I don't want to lose to. To me, that is.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And that is precisely why, Mejiro Ardan. I'll lay my heart bare: I don't wish to allow C.B. and Ace to get ahead of us like this.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'd like for us to raise the level of our movements even further— enough to eclipse their performance.
… Will you follow me? On this path.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Rudolf-san…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: … A truly rousing speech. Please, allow me to express my gratitude for putting your faith in my strength.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
But, in light of such matters… 
I'm terribly sorry, but I must humbly decline.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Eh?! A-Ardan-chan?!

Because simply "following" is hardly enough. 
… I, too, wish to elevate my level.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: A peerless value. For I, too, wish to display an overwhelming brilliance.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …! I see. Please, if I might implore you to elaborate…?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Very well… I shall explain in depth.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Rudolf-san, Maruzen-san, have either of you heard? 
The ceaseless snowfall as of late—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: — is forecasted to continue until the first day of the year.
With this, Mejiro Ardan and the others devised a new plan, perfecting their routine for the calligraphy performance… and then—!
It's f-f-f-freezing! Why'd they have to move the calligraphy performance from the gym to the grounds…?!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume A

text_block_list.text: Like, isn't the snow super crazy today? Geez, what are we gonna… a-ah! It's about to start…!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume B

text_block_list.text:
… Umamusume. From the very moment they are born, 
they are destined to run— existences checkered by fate.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Watched over by the three goddesses, their footsteps overlap, carving out a path. We, too, continue along the path of our ancestors.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: A brocade woven with glory. That we may too weave the continuation of that legacy—
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: We thus arrive here, and pay all of our respects—!
text_block_list.name: Ardan & Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Hah!
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
Hya-?! You're kidding… 
They're writing… on the snow?!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: That's… crazy… This insane, majestic presence…!!
("Snow Calligraphy"! I'd never expected such a suggestion to come from you… Mejiro Ardan!)
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: (But, so be it! Incredible! It is here our resolve will be realised! Now, to begin… Let us draw with our own two hands!)
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
(We'll illuminate everything, rouse every heart… 
and display the dazzling Northern Lights!)
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: H-huh?! She's gonna use that gigantic brush to…?!
text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!!
So for the calligraphy— hm. You've set your heart on that sentence, I suppose?
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Together with these words… 
I'll fulfill my role to the best of my abilities.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: I'll write using a big brush over a distance of 100 metres!
"Only one eclipses without another in sight."

I'll fulfill my duty. With these legs, with this body 
— I'll show them a brilliance like no other!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Ooh, as expected. 
You've got 'em all fired up, Ardan, Rudolf!
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Like we'll lose to them! 'Aight, looks like it's our turn—!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
